channel.title: Getting Nadeshiko
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Getting Nadeshiko" - How to?

item.title: Re: Getting Nadeshiko
item.content:encoded: Having the Love-Love Paradise permanent item off the Party Wheel doesn't hurt either. I managed with that, J-Diddy, the Ninja-Mas Spirit (off of a trainer, you don't need the HoClaus yourself) and setting up the previous day.

item.title: Re: Getting Nadeshiko
item.content:encoded:
To add to Uzuki:

I used Makeout Mood Enhancers for friend ship with Bruce Jr. to get Floating on Air.

You can then use Floating on Air to hang out with 3 the following day, and use another Makeout Mood Enhancers in order to have 4.

item.title: Re: Getting Nadeshiko
item.content:encoded:
The Ninja-mas Spirit (Doubles Friendship award, 20 Chakra, 100,000 JXP, taught by Ho-Claus)
Technically this is also the Party Room, but Love Love Paradise doubles friendship award and is a Super Rare)

item.title: Re: Getting Nadeshiko
item.content:encoded:
Friend rankings are listing the friend points of the top 10 people who have friend points with that ally at the time of day roll. The ones in bold are currently hanging out. Friend points only reset once you hang out with that ally, so you can build up sayâ€¦50,000 on Bruce Jr. one day, and then 20,000 the next day and be at 70,000 in the rankings.

Usually, when going for Nadeshiko, you tend to hang out with people with low friend point values (Annie, Big Bo, etc). This way you only need like 10k.

The other thing you can do is wait until you get 2 shamrocks (since we're going to start unleashing our Science! machine soon). Once you get 2 shamrocks and hang with Bruce Jr., you can get Floating on Air. Then just do a friend point run with a single ally, and swap them out at night and use Floating on Air to hang out with 3 others the next day.

Or you can wait for Makeout Mood Enhancers too.

item.title: Getting Nadeshiko
item.content:encoded:
I will be trying to get Nadeshiko but I have few question about Friend points and Top 10.

Friend Rankings: Are they tell you how many friend points this day player got for this ally? If so how can you get over 100k points as Bruce Jr. today and Billy and Emo near it?

What can you do to get points except: Silver Potion and Party Room, J-Diddy and TicTac.

Any advices?
